entry.title: LES SUÊTES WIND WARNING IN EFFECT, Grand Étang
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM ADT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Étang 09:00 AM ADT Tuesday 03 May 2016
Temperature: 8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: 3.6°C
Wind: ESE 94 km/h gust 126 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 110 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 near noon. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 03 May 2016
